short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate your messages for potential sour meanings!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing Sour Translator from SOUR PATCH KIDS Candy! This Chrome extension detects when you receive passive aggressive messages, letting you know the real meaning of the message. Works with Gmail and Outlook only. This is completely self contained, and does not store any of your email content.
